task.title: Integrating the Plugin with the DITA Open Toolkit
task.shortdesc: This topic includes the procedure for integrating the plugin with the DITA Open Toolkit.

keywords.indexterm: Integrating the WebHelp plugin with DITA OT

taskbody.context:
The requirements of the plugin for the DITA Open Toolkit are as follows:
Java Virtual Machine 1.6 or later
DITA Open toolkit 1.6.x, 1.7.x, 1.8, or 2.0 (Full Easy Install, includes Saxon 9.1.0.8 libraries)
Saxon 9.1.0.8 To integrate the plugin with the DITA Open Toolkit, follow these steps:

cmd.ph: Download and install a Java Virtual Machine 1.6 or later.

step.cmd: Download and install DITA Open Toolkit 1.6.x, 1.7.x, 1.8.x, or 2.x.
